Author: nttkcoin
Title: [ANN] NETTEK COIN-THE FUTURE OF DIGITAL MARKETING AND ONE OF THE FUTURE PAYMENT
Body: _______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________ NETTEK COIN THE FUTURE OF DIGITAL MARKETING AND ONE OF THE FUTURE PAYMENT GATEWAYS FOR FREELANCERS.   _______________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________                        WEBSITE |WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | WHATSAPP | TELEGRAM  | GPLUS| INSTAGRAM| YOUTUBE  Note: We shall reward our freelancers with NTTK Tokens for every ad they submit. Extra rewards are earned once seekers review their work. All our members will be eligible to participate in ‘NTTK Buyback Program.   ABOUT NETTEK COIN   The idea behind Nettekcoin is to create a freelancers Marketplace. Hire expert freelancers for any job, on the blockchain. One can highlight and advertise their skills, browse projects that need your skills and expertise, accept projects and assignments, complete them within deadlines and receive NTTK, OR other cryptocurrency: ETH, BTC, DASH, LTC, BCH as payments.  Nettek coin will create a decentralized ecosystem, using instant payments, on our blockchain with the lower fees. Our system is open for any freelancer, online gamers, web developers, content writers, coders, designers, marketing managers, editors and many more. Nettek coin will be the first digital marketing blockchain in one central social space with high performance and strong security, and apply multi-level authentication and encryption mechanism to create a new generation of blockchain, with leading blockchain 4.0. We offer the safest and most secure ways to connect with Freelancers & Recruiters Worldwide. Our own tokens will be in use for trade between freelancers and recruiters on NTTK Freelancer Marketplace platform of 29 million.  WHY NETTEK COIN      Pros summary: • Bringing Buyers, Sellers, Marketers, Recruiters together. • Powered by Smart Contracts. • NTTK Escrow Services. • NTTK Buyback Program. • Pay freelancers in Nettek coin, Ethereum, Bitcoin, DASH, Litecoin, Monero, ZCASH, DOGE Coin, & WAVE. Title: [ANN] NETTEK COIN-THE FUTURE OF DIGITAL MARKETING AND ONE OF THE FUTURE PAYMENT
Body: Based on what coin is yours made? It seems to me that when creating a new coin, you need to use a newer protocol. ERC223 or ERC721. They are more modern, faster and safer.
